comment:
>>44295542

“It's up to you.” You suggest.

“You don't care?” Nel asks.

“Nope.” You nod. “Let Tatsumaki have it. She's been rolling with us for too long without one to show.”

“Sounds fine to me.” Donnel says. Tatsumaki gives you an ear-to-ear grin as she accepts the gift.

“Ascheritte, get over here. Watch your toes, everyone.” Kainzo says, kneeling before the altar. You, Andor, and Ayla join him in his prayer. “Floor might change shape, and all.”

It doesn't, but grows cleaner, ever-closer to a pristine form. Shelves reposition themselves upon the walls, and sconces reform with violet embers burning within, casting an eerie but strangely beautiful light across the room as a whole. Radiance washes out from this alcove, righting the disarray in the study beyond, refreshing empty beakers and vials, dusting books, and filling the place as a whole with a heady scent.

> [[ Greater Celestial Materialization Altar ]]
> Celestial Manifestation “Averron Observatory”
> MANIFESTATION GRANTED BY:
Ascheritte, Andor, Ayla, and Kainzo, “as a safe haven upon which to engineer a future from a shattered past”
> [[ Offer Celestial Gems ]]
* Create Celestial Artifact
* Enhance Celestial Artifact
* Empower Mundane Item
* Enhance Celestial Manifestation
* Destroy Celestial Manifestation
* Vote to Enable/Disable PVP
* Modify Charter/Relinquish Ownership
> [[ Offer Item ]]
* Offer an Item to the Celestials

Your UI pings. Looks like you've got maps of the whole place—oh, hey, you actually own a quarter of this stuff. You'll start collecting taxes as soon as possible!

“Engineer a future from a...” Ayla groans. “Okay, that's too much for -me- to handle.”

“I thought it was cool!” Kainzo says. “Give me a break, I'm doing my best.”

“Could be worse, I guess.” You shrug. “Might as well see what we've got...”
name: Sylvetica
